entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
